Package tw.jruletest.files.test

Class TestClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • tw.jruletest.files.test.TestClass
  • public class TestClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to store details of a test class and provide methods of analysis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TestClass​(java.lang.String className)
      TestClass constructor uses the represented class's name to find the test class, collects the fields and methods and stores them in their respective objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Gets the stored class name
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getRules()
      Gets the rules extracted for each method in the class
      void read()
      Reads the test class to determine in what order to read the field and method return values
      void readFieldAfterMethod()
      Reads the value of the field after each method is invoked
      void readFields()
      For each field in the test field list, a new mapping is created with the field name as the key and the rules extracted as the value
      void readFromMethods()
      For each method in the test method list, a new mapping is created with the method name as the key and the rules extracted as the value

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestClass

        public TestClass​(java.lang.String className)
          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        TestClass constructor uses the represented class's name to find the test class, collects the fields and methods and stores them in their respective objects.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the test class to be represented by this object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the test class with the provided class name either doesn't exist or hss not been loaded into the classpath.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read()
        Reads the test class to determine in what order to read the field and method return values

      • readFields

        public void readFields()
                throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        For each field in the test field list, a new mapping is created with the field name as the key and the rules extracted as the value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - thrown if the field doesn't have a public access modifier

      • readFromMethods

        public void readFromMethods()
        For each method in the test method list, a new mapping is created with the method name as the key and the rules extracted as the value

      • readFieldAfterMethod

        public void readFieldAfterMethod()
                          throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Reads the value of the field after each method is invoked
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - thrown if the field doesn't have a public access modifier

      • getClassName

        public java.lang.String getClassName()
        Gets the stored class name
        Returns:
        the class name stored by this object

      • getRules

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getRules()
        Gets the rules extracted for each method in the class
        Returns:
        the map object mapping methods to sets of extracted rules
